commands.name: Deploy to RPI - Full Build & Transfer
commands.command: yarn build-prod && yarn build:linux-armv7l && echo 'Build complete! Transfer with: scp output/*.deb pi@raspberrypi.local:~/'
commands.description: Build production and create RPI installer (armv7l), then shows SCP command

commands.name: Deploy to RPI - ARM64 (Pi 5)
commands.command: yarn build-prod && yarn build:linux-arm64 && echo 'Build complete! Transfer with: scp output/*.deb pi@raspberrypi.local:~/'
commands.description: Build production and create RPI installer for ARM64 (Raspberry Pi 5)

commands.name: Deploy to RPI - Server Package
commands.command: yarn build-prod && yarn build:server-deb-armv7l && echo 'Server package built! Transfer with: scp output/*.deb pi@raspberrypi.local:~/'
commands.description: Build headless server package for RPI (armv7l)

commands.name: Deploy to RPI - Server Package ARM64
commands.command: yarn build-prod && yarn build:server-deb-arm64 && echo 'Server package built! Transfer with: scp output/*.deb pi@raspberrypi.local:~/'
commands.description: Build headless server package for RPI (ARM64)

commands.name: Transfer to RPI
commands.description: Transfer latest .deb package to Raspberry Pi

commands.name: Install on RPI
commands.command: ssh pi@raspberrypi.local 'sudo dpkg -i ~/*.deb && sudo apt-get install -f'
commands.description: Install .deb package on RPI via SSH (requires password)

commands.name: Setup RPI Serial Access
commands.command: ssh pi@raspberrypi.local 'sudo usermod -a -G dialout $USER && echo "User added to dialout group. Log out and back in for changes to take effect."'
commands.description: Add user to dialout group for serial port access

commands.name: Check RPI Status
commands.command: ssh pi@raspberrypi.local 'systemctl status nextcnc 2>/dev/null || echo "Service not found. Check if cncjs is running: ps aux | grep cncjs"'
commands.description: Check if NextCNC service is running on RPI

commands.name: Deploy to RPI - Complete Workflow
commands.command: echo '=== Building for RPI ===' && yarn build-prod && yarn build:linux-armv7l && echo '' && echo '=== Build complete! ===' && echo 'Next steps:' && echo '1. Transfer: scp output/*.deb pi@raspberrypi.local:~/' && echo '2. SSH: ssh pi@raspberrypi.local' && echo '3. Install: sudo dpkg -i ~/*.deb && sudo apt-get install -f' && echo '4. Setup serial: sudo usermod -a -G dialout $USER' && echo '5. Run: cncjs'
commands.description: Complete deployment workflow with all steps
